s0542.chinese: 五年，魏王來朝應亭，復與魏蒲阪。
s0542.literal: Fifth year, Wei king came to court at Yingting, returned Puban to Wei.
s0542.idiomatic: Fifth year, Wei king came to court at Yingting, returned Puban to Wei.

s0543.chinese: 六年，蜀侯煇反，司馬錯定蜀。
s0543.literal: Sixth year, Shu lord Hui rebelled, Sima Cuo pacified Shu.
s0543.idiomatic: Sixth year, Shu lord Hui rebelled, Sima Cuo pacified Shu.

s0544.literal: Senior Minister Huan attacked Chu, beheaded 20,000.
s0544.idiomatic: Senior Minister Huan attacked Chu, beheaded 20,000.

s0545.literal: Jingyang Jun went as hostage to Qi.
s0545.idiomatic: Jingyang Jun went as hostage to Qi.

s0549.chinese: 八年，使將軍羋戎攻楚，取新市。
s0549.literal: Eighth year, sent General Mi Yong to attack Chu, took Xinshi.
s0549.idiomatic: Eighth year, sent General Mi Yong to attack Chu, took Xinshi.

s0550.chinese: 齊使章子，魏使公孫喜，韓使暴鳶共攻楚方城，取唐眛。
s0550.literal: Qi sent Zhang Zi, Wei sent Gongsun Xi, Han sent Bao Yuan together attacked Chu Fangcheng, took Tangmei.
s0550.idiomatic: Qi sent Zhang Zi, Wei sent Gongsun Xi, Han sent Bao Yuan together attacked Chu Fangcheng, took Tangmei.

s0551.chinese: 趙破中山，其君亡，竟死齊。
s0551.literal: Zhao destroyed Zhongshan, its ruler fled, finally died in Qi.
s0551.idiomatic: Zhao destroyed Zhongshan, its ruler fled, finally died in Qi.

s0552.chinese: 魏公子勁、韓公子長為諸侯。
s0552.literal: Wei prince Jing, Han prince Chang became lords.
s0552.idiomatic: Wei prince Jing, Han prince Chang became lords.

s0553.chinese: 九年，孟嘗君薛文來相秦。
s0553.literal: Ninth year, Lord Mengchang Xue Wen came to be chancellor of Qin.
s0553.idiomatic: Ninth year, Lord Mengchang Xue Wen came to be chancellor of Qin.

s0554.chinese: 奐攻楚，取八城，殺其將景快。
s0554.literal: Huan attacked Chu, took eight cities, killed their general Jing Kuai.
s0554.idiomatic: Huan attacked Chu, took eight cities, killed their general Jing Kuai.

s0555.chinese: 十年，楚懷王入朝秦，秦留之。
s0555.literal: Tenth year, Chu King Huai entered to court Qin, Qin detained him.
s0555.idiomatic: Tenth year, Chu King Huai entered to court Qin, Qin detained him.

s0556.literal: Xue Wen took gold and was dismissed.
s0556.idiomatic: Xue Wen took gold and was dismissed.

s0558.chinese: 十一年，齊、韓、魏、趙、宋、中山五國共攻秦，至鹽氏而還。
s0558.literal: Eleventh year, Qi, Han, Wei, Zhao, Song, Zhongshan five states together attacked Qin, reached Yanshi and returned.
s0558.idiomatic: Eleventh year, Qi, Han, Wei, Zhao, Song, Zhongshan five states together attacked Qin, reached Yanshi and returned.

s0559.chinese: 秦與韓、魏河北及封陵以和。
s0559.literal: Qin and Han, Wei made peace with the land north of Yellow River and Fengling.
s0559.idiomatic: Qin and Han, Wei made peace with the land north of Yellow River and Fengling.
